name: Legal Services
description: IIBA offers citizenship, DACA renewal, family reunification, humanitarian, and deportation defense services. Below is a list of the various legal services that IIBA provides. Please note that the information provided here does not constitute individualized legal advice. Immigration applications and petitions are complex, so we strongly recommend contacting one of our offices for a consultation. - Citizenship: N-400 Naturalization Applications, fee waivers, disability waivers, and N-600s. - Defer

howToGetIt: Consultations are by appointment only. Contact a local IIBA to schedule an individual consultation: San Francisco (San Francisco County): Please call (415) 538-8100 ext. 206 Redwood City (San Mateo County): Please call (650) 780-7530 Oakland (Alameda County): Please call (510) 451-2846 ext. 301 or book online: https://www5.apptoto.com/b/oaklandlegalconsults/ Brentwood Office (Contra Costa County) Please call (925) 237-8581 ext. 11 or book online: https://www5.apptoto.com/b/brentwoodconsults/ Fremont (Alameda County): Please call (510) 894-3639 or book online: https://www5.apptoto.com/b/fremontconsultation/type Napa (Napa County): Please call (707) 266-1568 x 401or book online: https://www5.apptoto.com/b/napalegalservices/type Petaluma Office (Sonoma County): Please call (707) 932-7000 or book online: https://www5.apptoto.com/b/petaluma_legal_services/type
agency: Immigration Institute of the Bay Area
